name: Magicians
description:
Magicians is a shareware version of an upcoming 2-4 player local MP arena spellcasting game, inspired by the Warlock map for Warcraft III.

Join the game by pressing A on a controller in the Player screen.
Use LB, RB, LT, RT to assign a spell to each of those buttons inside the Spellbook screen.

NOTE: This game is controller only, and the main game will not work with keyboard and mouse. Also, it's only been tested with an Xbox 360 controller. Can't tell you what would happen with anything else.

Contact: linus.ax@gmail.com
Website: www.linusaxelsson.com
